sourcesContent:
// theme.js
export const lightTheme = {
  body: "#FFFFFF",
  text: "#343434",
  text2: "#333333",
  highlight: "#ECECEC",
  highlight1: "#FFE39A",
  highlight2: "#FAADC1",
  highlight3: "#D2BCFE",
  highlight4: "#F7D0BB",
  dark: "#000000",
  secondaryText: "#7F8DAA",
  imageHighlight: "#E3405F",
  compImgHighlight: "#E6E6E6",
  jacketColor: "#E3405F",
  headerColor: "#0E6BA877",
  svgBg: "#000000",
};

export const darkTheme = {
  body: "#1D1D1D",
  text: "#FFFFFF",
  text2: "#7E8CA9",
  accentColor: "#E3405F",
  highlight: "#ECECEC",
  highlight1: "#FFE39A",
  highlight2: "#FAADC1",
  highlight3: "#D2BCFE",
  highlight4: "#F7D0BB",
  dark: "#000000",
  secondaryText: "#8D8D8D",
  compImgHighlight: "#E6E6E6",
  jacketColor: "#E3405F",
  headerColor: "#0E6BA877",
  svgBg: "#000000",
  contactButtonColor: "#FC1056",
};

export const chosenTheme = darkTheme;
